donuts.name: Chocolate Glaze
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, milk, glaze (sugar, cocoa, vegetable oil), yeast.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Best consumed fresh.
donuts.modalDescription: A classic favorite—our Chocolate Glaze donut is dipped in a velvety chocolate coating that crackles with every bite. Simple, indulgent, and always satisfying.

donuts.name: Strawberry Sprinkle
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, strawberry puree, milk, sprinkles (sugar, cornstarch, food coloring), yeast.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Vibrant sprinkles may stain.
donuts.modalDescription: A burst of summer in every bite! Our Strawberry Sprinkle donut is topped with a tangy-sweet glaze and colorful confetti for a playful treat.

donuts.name: Vanilla Dream
donuts.description: Soft vanilla with a sugar dusting.
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, vanilla bean paste, milk, butter, powdered sugar.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Delicate vanilla aroma.
donuts.modalDescription: Cloud-like and comforting, our Vanilla Dream donut is lightly dusted with powdered sugar for a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

donuts.name: Oreo Cookie
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, crushed Oreo cookies, cream filling (sugar, vegetable oil, cocoa), milk.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy, soy. Crunchy cookie texture.
donuts.modalDescription: Cookie lovers rejoice! This donut is packed with Oreo crumbs and a creamy filling for a nostalgic crunch-and-cream combo.

donuts.name: Birthday Cake
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, rainbow sprinkles, vanilla frosting, milk, edible glitter.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Festive and shareable!
donuts.modalDescription: It’s always party time with our Birthday Cake donut! Topped with vanilla frosting, rainbow sprinkles, and a touch of edible glitter.

donuts.name: Cheesy Ring
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cream cheese, butter, salt, yeast.
donuts.modalDescription: For those who dare to mix sweet and savory! Our Cheesy Ring donut has a rich cream cheese swirl with a hint of salt for a bold twist.

donuts.name: Choco Pop
donuts.description: Fun-shaped donut with a shiny glaze.
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa, milk, chocolate glaze (sugar, cocoa, coconut oil).
donuts.modalDescription: A donut that’s as fun to look at as it is to eat! The Choco Pop’s unique shape and glossy chocolate glaze make it irresistible.

donuts.name: Choco Spark
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa, edible glitter (cornstarch, food-grade mica), milk.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Sparkles fade over time.
donuts.modalDescription: Dazzling and decadent! The Choco Spark donut is dipped in glossy chocolate and finished with edible glitter for a magical bite.

donuts.name: Crunchy Nut
donuts.description: Crispy donut packed with crunchy nuts.
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, mixed nuts (almonds, peanuts), honey, yeast.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, nuts. Extra crunchy texture.
donuts.modalDescription: Nut lovers, this one’s for you! Our Crunchy Nut donut is topped with a generous layer of toasted nuts for maximum crunch.

donuts.name: Golden Honey
donuts.description: Soft donut glazed in sweet honey.
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, local honey, milk, yeast.
donuts.modalDescription: A golden, honey-drenched delight! This donut is softly baked and dipped in warm honey glaze for a naturally sweet treat.

donuts.name: Mint Choco Cloud (Seasonal)
donuts.description: Chocolate cupcake with a mint cream burst.
donuts.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa, mint extract, fresh cream, dark chocolate.
donuts.practicalInfo: Contains gluten, dairy. Limited-time holiday special!
donuts.modalDescription: A winter surprise! Our Mint Choco Cloud cupcake hides a refreshing mint cream center inside a rich chocolate shell—perfect for the holidays.

donuts.name: Donut Box
donuts.modalDescription: The perfect way to share joy! Our sturdy Donut Box keeps your treats safe and stylish—ideal for gifting or parties.
